flawed_nl_solution:
30% of Mars is made up of other elements because 100 - 50 - 20 = <<100-50-20=60>>60
Mars weighs 250 tons because 150 / 0.6 = <<150/0.6=250>>250
The moon weighs 125 tons because 250 / 2 = <<250/2=125>>125
#### 125

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 60. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
